sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { useLocation, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const AdminSidebar = (props) => { const location = useLocation(); const history = useHistory(); const [showDropdown, setShowDropdown] = useState(false); // Define the handleDropdownClick function const handleDropdownClick = (route) => { history.push(route); }; return (
history.push("/admin/dashboard")} className={`${ location.pathname === "/admin/dashboard" ? "border-r-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-100" : "" } hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-6`} > Dashboard
history.push("/admin/dashboard/categories")} className={`${ location.pathname === "/admin/dashboard/categories" ? "border-r-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-100" : "" } hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-6`} > Categories
history.push("/admin/dashboard/products")} className={`${ location.pathname === "/admin/dashboard/products" ? "border-r-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-100" : "" } hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-6`} > Products
history.push("/admin/dashboard/orders")} className={`${ location.pathname === "/admin/dashboard/orders" ? "border-r-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-100" : "" } hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-6`} > Orders
history.push("/admin/dashboard/users")} className={`${ location.pathname === "/admin/dashboard/users" ? "border-r-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-100" : "" } hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-6`} > Users
history.push("/admin/dashboard/users")} className={`${ location.pathname === "/admin/dashboard/users" ? "border-r-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-100" : "" } hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-6`} > Appointment
{/* Rest of your code */}
setShowDropdown(!showDropdown)} className={`${ location.pathname === "/admin/dashboard/users" ? "border-r-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-100" : "" } hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-6`} > Repor
{showDropdown && (
handleDropdownClick("/admin/dashboard/allproducts") } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer" > All Products
handleDropdownClick("/admin/dashboard/salereport") } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer" > Sale report
handleDropdownClick("/admin/dashboard/inventory") } className="px-4 py-2 hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer" > Inventory
)}
;
); }; export default AdminSidebar;
